articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, Piper Hudspeth Blackburn, Nectar Gan, Yong Xiong
articles.title: Trump administration will ‘aggressively revoke’ Chinese student visas in major escalation with Beijing - CNN
articles.description: The United States will “aggressively revoke visas for Chinese students,” Secretary of State Marco Rubio announced Wednesday in a major escalation of tensions with Beijing, and another blow to American higher education institutions.
